definitions.definition: A heavy yellow elemental metal of great value, with atomic number 79 and symbol Au.
A coin or coinage made of this material, or supposedly so.
A deep yellow colour, resembling the metal gold.
The bullseye of an archery target.

definitions.example: France has won three golds and five silvers.

definitions.definition: Anything or anyone that is very valuable.
(in the plural) A grill (jewellery worn on front teeth) made of gold.
To pyrolyze or burn food until the color begins to change to a light brown, but not as dark as browning
